name: GP Mania
description:
Created in 3 hours for a Solent University Game Jam

Help the GP cure the patient by carefully aiming the pills or spamming them. The GP encounters a lot of distractions when it comes to curing the patient so help them overcome it.

How to play:

Space - Shoot

Credits:

Dave Welsby - Art (Items)

Petra Matos - Art (Characters + background)

Mitchell Dixon - Implementation and Programming
